quotes: I am the shadow and the light.
Every step I take changes the world.
I have become what I once feared.
You have no idea what I am.
Even death will not grant you rest.
I control the boundary between life and death.
They thought they could stop me. They created a monster.
This is not a request. It's an order.
You are already in my shadow.
I am the hunter... and the king.
